title: NTP Ep. 9 - Does God want you to be happy?
description:
Much of the fun, wonder, and satisfaction had been drained by my urgency to meet what I thought was God's expectations. Today we are going to talk about how trusting God means we can live in both the hard times and the good times. If you ever wonder if following God just means that life will always be hard, join me today.

We love the Dwell audio Bible app! Get 20% off at dwellapp.io/madeforthis

Download the free book club kit here: jennieallen.com
